scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy:hosting: cd frontend && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.start:emulators: concurrently --kill-others "firebase emulators:start --only functions" "cd functions && npm run build:watch"
scripts.dev:functions: concurrently --kill-others "yarn start:emulators --only functions" "cd functions && yarn build:watch"
